title: Another season of riot oce rigging their own ranked system.
body: So funny watching how clearly obvious this game is setting up teams to win before the solo/duo lobbys even open. can these match fixers at least make an effort to make it less obvious, maybe let 1 lane do alright in my team. here is an entire list of elo boosters. from my last game. .REMOVED.. and if any of you dipshits don't like me naming people suck a fat cock ay, think of how my team felt with all these fagots running a muck!

replies.body:
I can't believe you found out! 
We've been spending the last 12 months assigning beginner bots to your team ,and matching you against challengers

All seriousness, getting on tilt is pretty frustrating. 
I'd suggest you take a break before someone makes you cry.
